meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Bill Alston Wanda Berthelot Brendan Roche Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #4058.

td.p: Bill Alston, an accountant from Durham, North Carolina
Wanda Berthelot, a high school teacher from Lafayette, Louisiana
Brendan Roche, an account manager from Troy, New York (whose 2-day cash winnings total $0)

tr.td: THIS IS SPAIN
"KING" ME
NBA MVPs
EQUATIONS
NOT IN YOUR OLD DICTIONARY
YOU JUST SAVED MY _____

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [Before the reveals] I hope none of you wrote down "Herbert Hoover".)
...
(Alex: [To Brendan] Nope. And you didn\'t even specify which one.)
...
(Alex: [To Bill] Yeah, Bill. That\'s the reaction we\'re gonna get from a lot of our viewers -- "Huh? Harding? Who knew? Who cares?" $11,000 the wager, though.
You care.)
WandaWho is John F. Kennedy?
$2,000
BrendanWho is Harrison?
$9,200
BillWho is Kennedy
$11,000
(one of) John F Kennedy or Warren G. Harding')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'One of only 2 U.S. presidents to be outlived by their fathers')

tr.td: U.S. PRESIDENTS
One of only 2 U.S. presidents to be outlived by their fathers
Brendan
Wanda
Bill
2nd place: trip for 2 to Mexico
3rd place: trip for 2 to the Pinegrove Dude Ranch
New champion: $30,000
Brendan
Wanda
Bill

10 R,
3 W
(including 1 DD)

21 R
(including 1 DD),
1 W
(including 1 DD)
